original_title: 2025 Appropriation Bill: Breakdown of govt expenditure by ministry
original_body_lines: The Appropriation Bill for the 2025 financial year was presented to Parliament today (09), outlining the government’s proposed expenditure for the year from January 1, 2025 to December 31, 2025.
The total estimated government expenditure for the period from January 1 to December 31, 2025, has been set at Rs. 4,616 billion.
Details of the total expenditure by ministry are as follows:
Meanwhile, the following expenses have been allocated under the Special Spending Unit.
